function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Residents of gated communities showing less agreement to feeling of isolation","Impact":"Increased risk of social isolation and decreased well-being","Mitigation":"Implement community events and interaction spaces to foster social connections","Technologies":"Community management software for organizing events and communication","People":"Residents of gated communities","Owner":"Community management and residents association"},{"Description":"Preference for gated communities due to perceived safety during pandemics","Impact":"Exacerbates segregation and inequality, potentially leading to further spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote equity and access to resources in both gated and non-gated communities","Technologies":"Contact tracing and testing facilities for equitable distribution","People":"Policymakers, community leaders, residents of gated and non-gated communities","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Increased popularity of gated communities in the post-pandemic era","Impact":"Formation of exclusive enclaves that can hinder public health efforts and exacerbate social divides","Mitigation":"Integrate public health measures and resources in all types of communities, promote community collaboration","Technologies":"Public health monitoring systems, health education and awareness platforms","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, public health experts, community leaders","Owner":"Local government, urban planning authorities, public health organizations"}]}
